description: Creates a custom SSH key pair that you can use with an Amazon Lightsail instance. The create key pair operation supports tag-based access control via request tags. For more information, see the Amazon Lightsail Developer Guide.

parameters.name: keyPairName
parameters.description: The name for your new key pair.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: The tag keys and optional values to add to the resource during create. Use the TagResource action to tag a resource after it's created. (dict) --- Describes a tag key and optional value assigned to an Amazon Lightsail resource. For more information about tags in Lightsail, see the Amazon Lightsail Developer Guide. key (string) --- The key of the tag. Constraints: Tag keys accept a maximum of 128 letters, numbers, spaces in UTF-8, or the following characters: + - = . _ : / @ value (string) --- The value of the tag. Constraints: Tag values accept a maximum of 256 letters, numbers, spaces in UTF-8, or the following characters: + - = . _ : / @

nested_params.name: key
nested_params.description: The key of the tag. Constraints: Tag keys accept a maximum of 128 letters, numbers, spaces in UTF-8, or the following characters: + - = . _ : / @

nested_params.name: value
nested_params.description: The value of the tag. Constraints: Tag values accept a maximum of 256 letters, numbers, spaces in UTF-8, or the following characters: + - = . _ : / @

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The friendly name of the SSH key pair.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the key pair ( arn:aws:lightsail:us-east-2:123456789101:KeyPair/05859e3d-331d-48ba-9034-12345EXAMPLE).

nested_items.name: supportCode
nested_items.description: The support code. Include this code in your email to support when you have questions about an instance or another resource in Lightsail. This code enables our support team to look up your Lightsail information more easily.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The timestamp when the key pair was created ( 1479816991.349).

nested_items.name: availabilityZone
nested_items.description: The Availability Zone. Follows the format us-east-2a (case-sensitive).

nested_items.name: regionName
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services Region name.

nested_items.name: resourceType
nested_items.description: The resource type (usually KeyPair).

nested_items.name: tags
nested_items.description: The tag keys and optional values for the resource. For more information about tags in Lightsail, see the Amazon Lightsail Developer Guide.

nested_items.name: key
nested_items.description: The key of the tag.

nested_items.name: value
nested_items.description: The value of the tag.

nested_items.name: fingerprint
nested_items.description: The RSA fingerprint of the key pair.

nested_items.name: publicKeyBase64
nested_items.description: A base64-encoded public key of the ssh-rsa type.

nested_items.name: privateKeyBase64
nested_items.description: A base64-encoded RSA private key.

nested_items.name: operation
nested_items.description: An array of objects that describe the result of the action, such as the status of the request, the timestamp of the request, and the resources affected by the request.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The ID of the operation.

nested_items.name: resourceName
nested_items.description: The resource name.

nested_items.name: resourceType
nested_items.description: The resource type.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The timestamp when the operation was initialized ( 1479816991.349).

nested_items.name: availabilityZone
nested_items.description: The Availability Zone. Follows the format us-east-2a (case-sensitive).

nested_items.name: regionName
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services Region name.

nested_items.name: isTerminal
nested_items.description: A Boolean value indicating whether the operation is terminal.

nested_items.name: operationDetails
nested_items.description: Details about the operation ( Debian-1GB-Ohio-1).

nested_items.name: operationType
nested_items.description: The type of operation.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the operation.

nested_items.name: statusChangedAt
nested_items.description: The timestamp when the status was changed ( 1479816991.349).

nested_items.name: errorCode
nested_items.description: The error code.
